captions.text: My favorite champion is Jarvan IV.
"Could I be more epic?"
He has a high level of burst damage, two terrifying CC abilities and is very tanky.
As a tank he has high burst damage
and for champions who have high burst damage you must know the maximum burst damage you can deal at a certain time.
Often times, when you see the enemy's HP is high and think you can't kill them,
you can in fact kill them with your combo.
When I first played the game, I simply tried to kill the enemies.
In the past, I only built straight damage.
But now, I usually buy Brutalizer to work with my runes,
and then build some tank items, such as Aegis of the Legion and Randuin's Omen.
I fight with the abilities' base damage combined with a high level of armor penetration.
I like armor penetration because the base damage is high.
I won't build a lot of AD items.
I rely on the base damage to fight because I need to be tanky.
When I have enough armor penetration, my abilities can do tons of terrifying damage to the squishy enemy carries.
"You like my weapon? Come on over for a closer inspection!"
I love to have Orianna on my team because when I initiate, she can shield me and it absorbs some damage and increases my resistance.
When I using my E and Q combo to approach squishy enemy carries, or CC enemy champions, or use my ultimate to engage,
Orianna's ultimate can perfectly synergize with my abilities to perform a perfect combo.
Or I might need a champion with high AP damage such as Vladmir or Mordekaiser.
I can synergize well with [Vladimir's] ultimate to kill the enemy champions to make my CC worth it.
When you're playing Jarvan you must be conscious of timing for team fights,
knowing when to engage and when not to.
In most situations, a bad engage would make you take lots of damage
and at the same time scatter your team making it harder for them to fight with you,
so it's important to know the right time to engage.
I am Liu "Pdd" Mou.
I am from Invictus Gaming.
My favorite champion is Jarvan IV.
Demacia!

title: Pro Player Pick: Pdd Picks Jarvan IV
